Investor_12_pre_2.name: Akiko Sato
Investor_12_pre_2.content: As an investor, I have maintained a reputation of trustworthiness and pro-social behavior. My approach during the investment process was characterized by collaboration and open communication, fostering trust with my trustee. I demonstrated integrity by addressing discrepancies constructively and maintaining clear expectations while focusing on shared goals. This experience reinforces my strong commitment to being a reliable partner in future investments.

Investor_12_pre_3.name: Akiko Sato
Investor_12_pre_3.content: During this investment process, I demonstrated strong collaboration and open communication, which are key to building trust and integrity. My proactive engagement with the trustee and maintenance of clear expectations highlighted my reputation as a reliable partner who is dedicated to achieving mutual success. This experience strengthens my established reputation for trustworthiness and pro-social behavior, reinforcing the value I place on fostering successful partnerships.

Investor_12_pre_4.name: Akiko Sato
Investor_12_pre_4.content: Throughout this investment process, I have demonstrated strong commitment to collaboration and open communication, fostering a constructive relationship with the trustee. My proactive engagement and clear establishment of expectations showcase my trustworthiness and integrity as an investor. This experience solidifies my reputation as someone who values partnership integrity and collective success.

Trustee_17_pre_4.name: Fatima Ali
Trustee_17_pre_4.content: The trustee, Fatima Ali, has shown commendable trustworthiness and pro-sociality throughout the investment process. Her commitment to transparency and fairness in executing the allocation plan exceeded initial expectations, reflecting a genuine interest in my wealth accumulation. This behavior indicates strong competence and adherence to social norms, establishing her as a reliable partner for future investments, enhancing her reputation positively.
